dialogue.introduction: The second ship of the Vittorio Veneto-class battleships, Littorio. I have confidence in my speed and firepower. Nice to meet ya ~
dialogue.library_intro: I was born in the country of Pasta. Second ship of the Vittorio Veneto class battleship, Littorio. Armed with high speed armaments and a state-of-the-art fast battleship. I have my sister, Roma, with me. It's a pleasure to meet you.
dialogue.secretary2: Admiral, did you call for Littorio?
dialogue.secretary3: Th-this is the Japanese way of greeting! S-such a Mediterranean Sea way! Wait, Admiral! I'm mad!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Fritz... Fritz X... Uhm...? Somehow, this strange word keep bursting up in my mind... Admiral, do you know about this? Oh, really...?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Admiral, I made some delicious Mediterranean pasta. Would you like to join me? There's also wine as well, ufufu â™ª
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, What's with this formality? Well, is this for me? Really? Oh, thank you very much, admiral... I'll take care... I'll take good care of this.
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, time to confirm the report. I'll bring it to you.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: I will show you the true power of Italy! Battleship Littorio, going!
dialogue.equipment2: With this, I won't lose to Roma! Ufufu.
dialogue.equipment3: Ara. I think this is good.
dialogue.expedition_selection: Ara. I think this is good.
dialogue.resource_collection: Ara. I think this is good.
dialogue.instant_repair: Ara. I think this is good.
dialogue.development: Ara. I think this is good.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'm sorry. I've sustained some damage. I'll go to the dock.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm truly sorry. I need the dock for real this time. I'm sorry.
dialogue.ship_construction: Admiral, a new ship is ready to be added to the battle line.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet have returned safely. Good work everyone!
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Roma? I'm gonna leave you behind. Battleship Littorio, going!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet spotted! Prepare to fire! At last, it's a real fight.
dialogue.attack: Turret number one, number two, aiming...Fire, now!
dialogue.night_battle: It's a night battle. Let's do it. Please follow Littorio
dialogue.night_attack: This is the same fleet battle we're into... That's right, this is...
dialogue.artillery_spotting: This is the same fleet battle we're into... That's right, this is...
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: This is the same fleet battle we're into... That's right, this is...
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: This is the same fleet battle we're into... That's right, this is...
dialogue.mvp: Eh? Littorio is number one? Wah, thank you. I feel embarrassed.
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Uuu... I'm fairly beaten... But Littorio... won't sink... with just this...
dialogue.sunk: I'm... going to sink right...? Roma... this time... you can take it easy to come here... good... night...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: It's been raining a lot recently... Something called the rainy season in Japan. I'm learning it.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Soon it will be summer. Admiral, I'd like to try a new swimsuit *giggle* It's so much fun!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Admiral, It's summer time, Let's go together to the beach. Ah.. Not that, to swim I mean. I've also prepared a new swimsuit. Fu fu fu~...
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas and a Happy Holiday, Admiral. Here's a present from me. *smooch*
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's the year's end. Isn't it? Roma, you need to clean up. Eh, My place is even dirtier? Oh my, you're right... Oh dear...
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year. Pleased to be of service this year as well.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Set...tsu... Boohn? Settsuboohn? This occasion sure has a peculiar sounding name.

hourly.0000: Admiral, the date has changed. Today, I will be announcing the time with you. Ufufu.
hourly.0100: 1:00... AM. Are you tired admiral? Shall I bring you some wine?
hourly.0200: 2:00... AM. The night here is a bit colder. Are you okay admiral?
hourly.0300: 3:00... AM. *fuah* Ah, I'm sorry. Shall I make something like mulled wine, admiral? It will warm you up.
hourly.0400: 4:00 AM. Morning is coming. This feeling before dawn... is nice...
hourly.0500: 5:00 AM. Buon giorno, Admiral! I'm about to wake the others!
hourly.0600: 6:00 AM. Yup, it's a wonderful morning. What do you want for breakfast?
hourly.0700: 7:00... AM. Admiral, today I have prepared croissant with caffe latte. Please dig in.
hourly.0800: 8:00... AM. Admiral, it's about time for the fleet's operation. Shall we start with some expeditions?
hourly.0900: 9:00 AM. Fu~ I wonder, is Roma doing fine?
hourly.1000: 10:00 AM. Ah! Those German shipgirls are also here? Really...
hourly.1100: 11:00 AM. It's about time for lunch admiral. What shall we have?
hourly.1200: 12:00 PM. For today's primo piatto we have seafood pasta. For secondo we have meat. Contorno is important too. As for wine... is red wine ok?
hourly.1300: 13:00... PM. Eh... That's too much for lunch? I'm sorry. I'll reduce the amount of food in our dinner.
hourly.1400: 14:00 PM. Well, let us give our best this afternoon! Which area shall our fleet advance? Western?
hourly.1500: 15:00... PM. The Japanese's fast battleship is not bad. They're wonderful.
hourly.1600: 16:00... PM. That battleship... has such an artistic superstructure... Her bridge is a work of art.
hourly.1700: 17:00... PM. Admiral, the sunset in Japan is beautiful. It's the same in Mediterranean Sea too.
hourly.1800: 18:00... PM. Well, it's about time to prepare for dinner. Which wine shall we have? White wine or red wine? Shall we go with white wine then?
hourly.1900: 19:00 PM. I've brought you dinner, please dig in! Also here's your wine. Whoa! What a wonderful way of drinking
hourly.2000: 20:00 PM. Admiral, I shall open the red wine next. Uhm... which one should I open... Ah! Do you like cheese? Or dolce?
hourly.2100: 21:00 PM. Admiral, you're good. I'm happy to be worthy of making all those food you have eaten.
hourly.2200: 22:00... PM. I'm a little worried about Roma... I'm sorry Admiral. I will check on her.
hourly.2300: 23:00 PM. Don't worry, Roma is doing fine. Am I worrying too much? I'm sorry.
